content: When playing twister at a recent party we ran into the predicament of a broken "spinner". So I wrote an automated "spinner" that doesn't require you to do anything... Once you've told it who's playing it just spins and says who should put what limb where! I've just made it available for anyone to use and it can be found here: http://craig.mayhew.io/twister/ Happy twisting!
title: Automated Spinner for Twister
name: automated-spinner-for-twister
